# .\configure.txt
# This file is generated automatically by configure.js.

XMLSEC_VERSION_MAJOR=1
XMLSEC_VERSION_MINOR=2
XMLSEC_VERSION_SUBMINOR=23
BASEDIR=..
XMLSEC_SRCDIR=..\src
APPS_SRCDIR=..\apps
BINDIR=binaries
WITH_CRYPTO=mscrypto openssl
WITH_DEFAULT_CRYPTO=mscrypto
WITH_OPENSSL=1
WITH_OPENSSL_VERSION=XMLSEC_OPENSSL_110
WITH_NSS=0
WITH_MSCRYPTO=1
WITH_LIBXSLT=1
WITH_ICONV=1
WITH_NT4=0
UNICODE=1
DEBUG=0
STATIC=0
WITH_DL=1
PREFIX=%PREFIX%
BINPREFIX=$(PREFIX)\bin
INCPREFIX=$(PREFIX)\include
LIBPREFIX=$(PREFIX)\lib
SOPREFIX=$(PREFIX)\lib
INCLUDE=$(INCLUDE);..\..\libxml2\include;..\..\libiconv\include;..\..\libxslt
LIB=$(LIB);..\..\Release
CRUNTIME=/MD
